Package us.jbec.lct.security

package us.jbec.lct.security
Spring security configuration classes and objects

    Description
    AuthenticationFilter
    Authentication filter for extracting Firebase tokens and attempting authentication
    AuthorizedUser
    POJO to represent an Authorized User of the application for Spring Security purposes.

    Configuration class for Spring Security, securing REST endpoints and web pages
